xml:
Berinert<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Acute attacks of hereditary angioedema (under expert supervision)

By slow intravenous injection or by intravenous infusion

  • Adult

    20 units/kg.

Short-term prophylaxis of hereditary angioedema before dental, medical, or surgical procedures (under expert supervision)

By slow intravenous injection or by intravenous infusion

  • Adult

    1000 units for 1 dose, to be administered less than 6 hours before procedure.
